instruction: Summarize the passage in two lines.
input: Coffee is one of the most popular and widely consumed beverages around the world. It is believed to be the world’s second most traded commodity, just behind oil. People have been consuming coffee for hundreds of years, even though it was initially used as a medical beverage.
output: Coffee is one of the most beloved beverages worldwide and is the second most traded commodity after oil. For centuries, it has been consumed both for pleasure and medicinal purposes.
